summary: Daphne and her four children try to cope with the abrupt death of husband/father. As the family seems to fall apart, a sudden incident gives them a chance to heal their 'broken wings'.
cast: Orly Silbersatz|Maya Maron|Daniel Magon|Nitai Gvirtz|Eliana Magon|Vladimir Friedman|Dana Ivgy|Yarden Bar-Kochba|Danny Niv|Orit Boger|Nimrod Cohen|Eitan Green|Martin Umanski|Shira Vilensky|Lobo Wizner|Dror Yakar|Eli Zulta|Adi Lev
title: Knafayim Shvurot
